name: Coffee Apron
description: This 100% cotton apron has a unique design to make cooking fun! The top is coffee beans, accented with brown buttons, and a skirt of espresso, cappuccino, & coffee in browns, greens, and turquoise.  The bottom is trimmed with a band of brown & turquoise dot, and a band of coffee beans.  The pocket is trimmed with a colorful ribbon band that is accented with a lime green button that sports a hand towel with lime green trim.  Fits size Med-Large.  I welcome custom orders!
